name: Skeleton Words 6 Quiz | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: RS (the first sign of the zodiac)
H (an American state)
NT (a sister of one's father or mother)
W (an American state)
SSSSN (a murderer, especially one who kills a prominent political figure)
BRRR (anything that prevents or obstructs passage)
SL (passageway separating seating areas in a theatre or church)
LFLD (an area containing reserves of petroleum)
VRYN (all)
K (any of various diving birds of northern oceans which have a black and white plumage)
D (relating to sound or hearing)
MLC (the desire to do harm or mischief)
RCH (otalgia)
questions.explanation:
Earache & earache.

	Otalgia being the technical name for earache

questions.text: GR (a mountain in central Switzerland)
LXR (an alchemical preparation supposed to be capable of prolonging life indefinitely)
PHR (a feeling of great elation)
KD (a Japanese system of self defence)
NGLT (any of a large group of mammals all of which have hooves)
SPHGS (part of the alimentary canal between the pharynx and the stomach)
questions.explanation:
Oesophagus & oesophagus & Esophagus & esophagus.

	Esophagus is the American spelling with thanks to caliber66

questions.text: SHML (narrator of the novel 'Moby Dick')
LSNN (university city in Switzerland on Lake Geneva)
MRB (a large black-and-white African carrion-eating stork)
DRD (the first name of the French painter Manet)
RB (a small African antelope with a fawn-coloured coat)
L (garlic mayonnaise)
questions.explanation:
Aioli & aioli.

	Hope you enjoyed the quiz.
